TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access on the server to the HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用控制來以程式設計方式控制 HTML``伺服器上的項目。Use the control to programmatically control the HTML `
` element on the server.這可讓您在網頁上建立資料表。This allows you to create a table on a Web page.您可以動態變更的外觀`
`項目，藉由設定， ， ， ，和屬性。You can dynamically change the appearance of the `
` element by setting the , , , , and properties. 您也可以控制顯示方式設定儲存格內容， ，和屬性。You can also control how the content of a cell is displayed by setting the , , and properties. 資料列控制會儲存在控制項的屬性。The rows of the control are stored in the property of the control. 這可讓您以程式設計方式存取個別的資料列的資料表。This allows you to programmatically access the individual rows of the table. > [!NOTE] > 不支援複雜的資料表模型。A complex table model is not supported. 您不能控制與巢狀``， ``， ``， ``，或``項目。You cannot have an control with nested ``, ``, ``, ``, or `` elements.這些項目移除而不發出警告，並不會出現在輸出 HTML 中。These elements are removed without warning and do not appear in the output HTML.如果您嘗試以程式設計方式新增至這些資料表模型項目，則擲回例外狀況的集合控制項。An exception will be thrown if you attempt to programmatically add these table model elements to the collection of the control.如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示資料表中的資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to display information in a table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以動態方式建立控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]
`， ``, `

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 資料表 」 的常值字串。The "table" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a new instance of an control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項相對於 Web 網頁上其他項目的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 和 Web 網頁上其他項目相關的 控制項之對齊方式。

span.span: The alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式在網頁上其他項目相關的控制項。Use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會控制之儲存格內容的對齊方式控制項。This property does not control the alignment of the contents in the cells of the control. 若要控制個別儲存格內容的對齊方式，使用並的屬性類別。To control the alignment of contents of an individual cell, use the and properties of the class. 您也可以使用來控制整個資料列之儲存格內容的對齊並的屬性類別。You can also control the alignment of contents of the cells in an entire row by using the and properties of the class. 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|對齊控制項在網頁左邊緣。Aligns the control on the left edge of the Web page.| |`Center`|對齊Web 頁面中間的控制項。Aligns the control in the middle of the Web page.| |`Right`|對齊網頁的右邊緣的控制項。Aligns the control on the right edge of the Web page.| > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定`Left`或是`Right`對齊方式，在網頁上的其他項目會自動換行的左右分別控制。If you specify `Left` or `Right` alignment, other elements on the Web page will wrap to the right or left of the control, respectively. 如果您指定`Center`對齊，不會換行，就會發生，以及其他項目會出現在控制項下方。If you specify `Center` alignment, no wrapping occurs and other elements appear below the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式在網頁上其他項目相關的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
The background color of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的背景色彩控制項。Use the property to specify the background color of the control. 您可以指定的色彩，依名稱或使用十六進位值，加上井字號字元 （#），在表單 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255，分別表示色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，#0000FF 值代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (從 00) 紅色和綠色元件，而指定的藍色元件中指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |桃紅Fuchsia|# FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |橄欖色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白皮書White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可用的色彩，以搭配屬性可以決定從列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制的背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Border { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Border : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the border of the control.

value.span: 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the border of an control.

value.span: 預設值是 -1，表示未設定框線寬度。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that the border width is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定框線的寬度。Use the property to specify the width of the border. 如果您不想顯示的框線控制項，將此屬性設定為 0 （沒有框線寬度） 則為-1 （未設定框線寬度）。If you do not want to display a border for the control, set this property to either 0 (no border width) or -1 (border width is not set). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制的框線寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

The border color of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框線色彩控制項。Use the property to specify the border color of the control. 您可以指定的色彩，依名稱或使用十六進位值，加上井字號字元 （#），在表單 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255，分別表示色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，#0000FF 值代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (從 00) 紅色和綠色元件，而指定的藍色元件中指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |桃紅Fuchsia|# FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |橄欖色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白皮書White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可用的色彩，以搭配屬性可以決定從列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制的框線色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中儲存格內容與其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 控制項中儲存格內容與其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會新增至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度;因此，間距已套用至資料行中最寬的資料格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 間距會套用至資料列中最高的儲存格。The spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制的儲存格內容和中的儲存格的框線之間的間距控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing between the contents of the cell and the cell's border in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的個別儲存格之間的間距控制項。Use the property to control the spacing between individual cells in the control. 此間距已套用垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的儲存格間距控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing of cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 為 控制項建立新的 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object for the control.

returns.span: ，包含 控制項的子伺服器控制項。

span.span: A that contains the control's child server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立用來保存資料表的資料列的物件。The method creates a object that is used to hold table rows. 方法主要是對控制項開發人員有利，可用以擴充 控制項的功能。The method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Height { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Height : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.
The height of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的高度控制項。Use the property to control the height of the control. 高度通常指定像素為單位。The height is normally specified in pixels. 不過，您也可以在值後面附加百分比符號 （%），指定瀏覽器視窗高度的百分比。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window height by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值`100%`表示之資料表的全部高度瀏覽器視窗的高度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a height for the table that is the full height of the browser window. 資料表會自動擴大，和縮小隨著使用者更改視窗大小。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的值小於才可顯示的內容控制項，此屬性會被忽略。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制的高度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 嘗試從這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

summary.span: 將 控制項的子控制項呈現為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's child controls to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供其他格式設定之前和之後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 其他格式設定可讓呈現的 HTML控制項的插入傳回行和縮排呈現之前讀取的工作變得更容易控制項的子控制項。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child controls. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使新的資料表資料列會附加至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a new table row is appended to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildrencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildrenvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Sub RenderEndTag (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 呈現 控制項的結束標記。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會提供其他格式之後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 其他格式設定可讓呈現的 HTML插入行讀取的工作變得更容易控制傳回結尾後面``標記。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return after the closing `
` tag.方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，讓它一律會寫入結束標記和新行中自訂伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always writes an end tag and a new line in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtagcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtagvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Rows As HtmlTableRowCollection

summary.span: 取得 集合，其中包含 控制項中的所有列。

span.span: Gets an collection that contains all the rows in the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中所有的資料列。

span.span: An that contains all the rows in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要以程式設計方式存取中的資料列集合控制項。Use the collection to programmatically access the rows in the control. 您可以程式設計方式加入要移除資料列，或插入集合中的資料列的資料列。You can programmatically add rows to, remove rows from, or insert rows into the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果有任何``中所列的項目控制項，空會傳回物件。If there are no `` elements listed in the control, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要以程式設計方式加入資料列集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to programmatically add a row to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Width { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Width : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the control.
The width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的寬度控制項。Use the property to control the width of the control. 像素為單位，通常被指定寬度。The width is normally specified in pixels. 不過，您也可以在值後面附加百分比符號 （%），指定瀏覽器視窗寬度的百分比。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window width by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值`100%`指出瀏覽器視窗的整個寬度的資料表的寬度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a width for the table that is the full width of the browser window. 資料表會自動擴大，和縮小隨著使用者更改視窗大小。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的值小於才可顯示的內容控制項，此屬性會被忽略。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制的寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]
